verbs.description: President Trump [V: did] not invite John Bolton to his recent meeting with a North Korean envoy , after being advised that including the national security adviser would be “ counterproductive . ”

[ARG0: President Trump] did [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: invite] [ARG1: John Bolton] [ARG2: to his recent meeting with a North Korean envoy] , [ARGM-TMP: after being advised that including the national security adviser would be “ counterproductive] . ”
President Trump did not invite John Bolton to his recent meeting with a North Korean envoy , after [V: being] advised that including the national security adviser would be “ counterproductive . ”

[ARG1: President Trump] did not invite John Bolton to his recent meeting with a North Korean envoy , after being [V: advised] [ARG2: that including the national security adviser would be “ counterproductive] . ”

President Trump did not invite John Bolton to his recent meeting with a North Korean envoy , after being advised that [V: including] [ARG1: the national security adviser] would be “ counterproductive . ”
President Trump did not invite John Bolton to his recent meeting with a North Korean envoy , after being advised that including the national security adviser [V: would] be “ counterproductive . ”

President Trump did not invite John Bolton to his recent meeting with a North Korean envoy , after being advised that [ARG1: including the national security adviser] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: be] “ [ARG2: counterproductive] . ”
